website_summaries.verdict: Worth considering if you are looking for a gift basket that's a bit out of the ordinary – provided you get one that is well-packed and fresh.
pros: Contains 12 varieties of roasted nuts and seeds loaded with protein, which makes it a nice gift for more healthful snacking
Comes packaged in a wooden tray
cons: Portions are on the small side, but the upside is the wide variety
Rare reports of a few of the nuts having an "old" taste
Some baskets arrived a bit disheveled

customer_reviews.title: Mine seems very old. The person I sent it ...
customer_reviews.text: Mine seems very old. The person I sent it to as a gift hadn't told me anything until I met her in person. The nuts went rancid, she tossed it away. No expiration date on it as well.
customer_reviews.author: Thong

customer_reviews.title: Highly recommend!
customer_reviews.text: Super fresh! Great gift! Brought to my parents for thanksgiving was enjoyed by all! Love the beautiful box it comes in! Highly recommend!
customer_reviews.author: Dee

customer_reviews.title: Fantastic gift. Great representation of the product.
customer_reviews.text: I ordered this for my sister and her husband. They absolutely loved the nuts and were happy the company is family owned. The wooden box the nuts were packed in has been repurposed holding craft items. A big hit all the way!! I will order again as a gift and will order one for me!!
customer_reviews.author: Harmonybits

customer_reviews.title: Delicious, high quality
customer_reviews.text: Delicious, high quality nuts arranged in a cool box. Very solid feeling. To improve, vendor should include a "treasure map" of which type of nut is where. Family debated which ones were brazil nuts vs macadamia nuts. The chocolate companies know that a "treasure map" is part of the whole experience of getting a chocolate box. We need one for this great nut box.
customer_reviews.author: Picky Picky

customer_reviews.title: Great tasting fresh nuts
customer_reviews.text: Great tasting fresh nuts , delivered super quickly ! Everyone at my event was raving about the assortment and the presentation!
customer_reviews.author: Levi

customer_reviews.title: Great holiday gift for healthy eaters
customer_reviews.text: I didn't eat these myself, but I gifted them in lieu of sweets to someone that doesn't eat carbs. He said he really enjoyed them and I thought the packaging and presentation was great. It didn't need any extra sprucing up with wrapping paper or anything.
customer_reviews.author: asp_

customer_reviews.title: Everyone enjoyed the nuts
customer_reviews.text: I ordered this item as a Christmas gift but ended up bringing it to Thanksgiving dinner at my father's house. Everyone enjoyed the nuts! The package arrived in a timely manner as promised and the nuts tasted fresh and delicious. My father is diabetic so this was a great alternative to all the unhealthy, sugar-laden treats that you find to be popular around the holidays. I highly recommend this product. You won't be disappointed.
customer_reviews.author: AZ CAT

customer_reviews.title: First off this is excellent, Iloved the packaging and the wooden container
customer_reviews.text: First off this is excellent, Iloved the packaging and the wooden container , Although there wasn't an actual lid to put on , I see no big deal. The nuts tasted great and weren't stale at all ! They tasted great and has some of my favorite nuts in the package. This would be a great gift to anyone to loves these kind of things ^_^ Very enjoyable and in the end , Clean out the wooden container and use it for something else !~ Awesome
customer_reviews.author: Dani Dawson

customer_reviews.title: Nuts 4 Nuts
customer_reviews.text: I gave this as a Christmas gift to a family member and they're still eating on it and enjoying it. It has a huge variety of nuts he's never tried and he was surprised and excited to see how many different choices there are. He loved the box and how it was wrapped as well. This is an AMAZING gift for the nutty nut lover in your life.
customer_reviews.author: MrsWhite

customer_reviews.title: Broken up and tasteless.
customer_reviews.text: Edited: customer service contacted me and sent out a new box that wasn't damaged. I can say that so the nuts are there, but for the price the product could be done better. There is at least one type of nut in each square and all smashed up. I needed this in a pinch for a gift and now will have to go find something else. I'll let my kids dig through this.
customer_reviews.author: Jchambers

customer_reviews.title: Not as pictured-not worth the price
customer_reviews.text: While I realize that nuts are relatively expensive, the picture displayed on the Amazon site of this item and the product I received are very different. I am still debating about sending it back as I would be embarrassed to give this as a gift. Each different nut item has a very small amount of the product in each "pouch" - a true waste of money.
customer_reviews.author: Marlene W

customer_reviews.title: This seller will go the extra mile to make sure the customer is satisfied. Buy with confidence and give these nuts a ...
customer_reviews.text: 6/17/18 update. This seller will go the extra mile to make sure the customer is satisfied. Buy with confidence and give these nuts a try.
customer_reviews.author: r!der

customer_reviews.title: so good
customer_reviews.text: each and every nut is so tasty. I just wish the lid snapped on to be securely closed as sliding the ribbon and off is daunting :~) felt very spoiled getting myself these. yum yum
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Delicious
customer_reviews.text: A very delicious selection of nuts. A good quantity and quality.
customer_reviews.author: Summer

customer_reviews.title: Much appreciation for the gift of Oh Nuts!
customer_reviews.text: The box of nuts which arrived in time roved to be the ideal gift for the trainers at my physical fitness facility. Every one seem to enjoy the nut, and there was a good variety for them to chose from.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Nuts To Snack On
customer_reviews.text: This is a great gift for my brother! He is going to enjoy adding them to his snacking menu. Excellent package and great display of the different varieties of nuts and seeds.
customer_reviews.author: ilma tikkanen

customer_reviews.title: Great gift for healthy eaters
customer_reviews.text: I got this for my father in law for fathers day and he loved it! I had some too and it tasted amazing !!

customer_reviews.title: Poor - don’t let them sucker you

customer_reviews.title: Excellent
customer_reviews.text: Wonderful! The nuts and seeds are so fresh and tasty. My husband loved the corn nuts as well. They were not stiff and hard, yet still crunchy.

customer_reviews.title: The nuts came in a timely manner in excellent condition. They are fresh and delicious
customer_reviews.text: These nuts were a Valentine’s gift for my husband. He cannot have sweets but he loves nuts. I gave him this and he loves it! The nuts came in a timely manner in excellent condition. They are fresh and delicious. It was s big hit! Thank you Oh Nuts! I would highly recommend this product!

customer_reviews.title: Good value

customer_reviews.text: I bought this as a valentine gift. We sampled all the nuts and they are all stale and un-edible. I prefer to return it.

customer_reviews.title: Great product and company

customer_reviews.text: I gave these to corporate clients and they loved them!

customer_reviews.title: 2 for 2!  Christmas hit!
customer_reviews.text: This is the second year in a row that I bought the Oh Nuts! gift basket for my boss. He really loves it. He can not eat cookies and candy because of diabetes- so he loves these snacks. I guess I will order another one this year. Item shipped as promised. Nice presentation. Thank you.

customer_reviews.title: Well worth the $.
customer_reviews.text: This was a gift and was told the quality of these mixed nuts we're tasty, would buy again.

customer_reviews.title: Happy nut lovers

customer_reviews.title: Delicious and great packaging
customer_reviews.text: Purchased 2 boxes as Christmas gifts for my in-law's. They loved them! The nuts were delicious, and both parents stated that they loved that the nuts were separated into sections. Both also likened the packaging: they're both trying to plan on what they will do with the boxes after the nuts are gone to display small items.
customer_reviews.author: Jo Ann Robinson

customer_reviews.title: A wonderful gift to give and to receive.
customer_reviews.text: 😊👍 I gave this as a gift and bought one for myself too. I loved this! Such a nice gesture too.

customer_reviews.title: Good presentation!
customer_reviews.text: This package of nuts and seeds was a hit at Christmas! It was a gift for a family member, but everyone was commenting on all the different items included! I wouldn't hesitate to buy it as a gift again.
customer_reviews.author: chb23

customer_reviews.title: 4 stars
customer_reviews.text: My only complaint was that the presentation was ruined by the nut skins and salt residue on the clear cover making it look old and not very appetizing.. after opening it and rearranging the nuts and seeds it looked better and the taste was fine. Just needs a better presentation...
customer_reviews.author: Joanna Strain

customer_reviews.title: Nice variety
customer_reviews.text: Nice variety of nuts, great packaging. Just enough for a little snack while watching a movie.
customer_reviews.author: j. george

customer_reviews.title: Great gift
customer_reviews.text: I sent this to my dad as a gift. I was hoping the presentation was ok since I sent it direct to him. He called when he received it and said it was great. He loved the mixed nuts and said the box was so nice he was going to reuse it.

customer_reviews.title: loved it!
customer_reviews.text: I sent this to our niece & family in Hawaii and they loved it!

customer_reviews.title: Great post-vasectomy gift!
customer_reviews.text: I recently bought this gourmet gift for a good friend following his vasectomy. Delivery was prompt and the folks at Oh Nuts! provided excellent service. He was very pleased with the variety and quality of nuts and seeds. Will definitely order from them again!

customer_reviews.title: Makes a wonderful nutty gift

product_meta.title: Oh! Nuts 12 Variety Mixed Nut Gift Basket, Holiday Freshly Roasted Healthy Gourmet Snack Gifts| Premium Wood Tray | Prime Christmas Food Baskets for Men & Women, Fathers & Mother’s Day Unique Idea
feature_bullets: PRESENT A GIFT THAT LEAVES A MEMORABLE IMPRESSION: This signature Oh! Nuts rustic wooden tray is filled to the brim with healthy goodies. The lidded container is neatly divided into 12 compartments featuring an assortment of HIGH-QUALITY GRADE A FRESH NUTS. Replace the traditional candy, chocolates, and baked goods with healthier, trendier vegan treats.

FESTIVE NUTS BURSTING WITH UNIQUE FLAVOR: You and your family will love to snack on this tasty sampler of sweet, salty, and savory goodness. The jumbo cashews, pecans and filberts are freshly roasted to perfection and then slightly salted to enhance their truly delicious taste, the pistachios are rich, nutty, with pleasing earthy undertones and the pumpkin and sunflower seeds provide a fun mouthful of assorted crunchy goodies.

MORE POPPING FLAVORS: The raw walnuts have a pleasant, savory flavor and smooth, buttery consistency, the spicy corn nuts are incredibly difficult to resist and the super-snack almonds are loaded with fiber, vitamins, and minerals. The salted Brazil nuts and peanuts add even more value to this delightful gift package. Last but definitely not least, the macadamia nuts are lip-smacking, mouthwatering bomb knockouts!

SAY THANK YOU WITH THESE YUMMY SNACKS: Whether you are looking to show appreciation to your grandfather or grandmother, to your hostess or coworkers, him or her, the Oh! Nuts deluxe vegetarian baskets bring joy and fun to every party. The remarkable blend of flavors and textures forms a gift presentation that’s appealing to the eyes as well as the palate. These nuts are OK Certified Kosher, non-Dairy, sugar free, all-Natural and super high in protein.

READY WRAPPED; DELIVER DIRECT TO RECIPIENT: Whether it’s Halloween, New Year’s, Hanukkah, an anniversary or birthday celebration, or a corporate lunch with clients, the Oh! Nuts premium nuts arrangement is enjoyed by foodies and non-foodies alike. Presented in a beautifully wrapped sturdy wooden sectional box, it is all set to be sent and readily devoured. 100% satisfaction guaranteed; love it or get your money back.
